import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import teamsReducer from'./teamsSlice';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';// defaults to localStorage for web
const persistConfig={key:'root',storage};const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,teamsReducer);let store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer});let persistor=persistStore(store);export{store,persistor};
